## MetaManager tag searchTag

Gets files/dirs with a particular tag

### Synopsis

Gets files/dirs with a particular tag. Use --tree flag to output results in tree format.

```
MetaManager tag searchTag [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for searchTag
  -t, --tree   Output results in tree format
```
